items.title: I can’t access external web links. Please paste the full article text (or the key paragraphs and facts) here, and I’ll create a new H2 title and a concise 4–6 heading outline that preserves all named entities and numeric facts exactly.
items.excerpt: Because I cannot open external web links, I need the article text or the essential paragraphs and facts pasted into the chat. Provide the full copy or the critical excerpts and I will produce a new H2 title and a concise 4–6 heading outline that preserves all named entities and numeric facts exactly.
